summary:
Nestlé is a huge Swiss food and drink company, the biggest in the world since 2014. It makes lots of things like coffee, candy, baby food, and pet food. Some of its famous brands are Kit Kat, Nescafé, and Maggi. Nestlé has factories all over the world and employs tens of thousands of people.

The company started in 1905 when two older businesses merged. It has grown a lot, especially during wars. But Nestlé has also faced criticism for its practices, like promoting baby formula instead of breastfeeding in poor countries and using child labor to make cocoa.
title: Nestlé
